verses.verse: Adam, <S%H121><s%> Seth, <S%H8352><s%> Enosh, <S%H583><s%>
Kenan, <S%H7018><s%> Mahalalel, <S%H4111><s%> Jared, <S%H3382><s%>
Enoch, <S%H2585><s%> Methuselah, <S%H4968><s%> Lamech, <S%H3929><s%>
Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japheth <S%H3315><s%> [were] Gomer, <S%H1586><s%> Magog, <S%H4031><s%> Madai, <S%H4074><s%> Javan, <S%H3120><s%> Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tiras. <S%H8494><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gomer <S%H1586><s%> [were] Ashkenaz, <S%H813><s%> Diphath, <S%H9084><s%> and Togarmah. <S%H8425><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Javan <S%H3120><s%> [were] Elishah, <S%H473><s%> Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> Kittim, <S%H3794><s%> and Rodanim. <S%H9546><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%> [were] Cush, <S%H3568><s%> Mizraim, <S%H4714><s%> Put, <S%H6316><s%> and Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%> [were] Seba, <S%H5434><s%> Havilah, <S%H2341><s%> Sabta, <S%H5454><s%> Raama, <S%H7484><s%> and Sabteca; <S%H5455><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Raamah <S%H7484><s%> [were] Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan. <S%H1719><s%>
And Cush <S%H3568><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nimrod; <S%H5248><s%> he began <S%H2490><s%> to be a mighty <S%H1368><s%> one <S%H1368><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of the people <S%H3866><s%> of Lud, <S%H3866><s%> Anam, <S%H6047><s%> Lehab, <S%H3853><s%> Naphtuh, <S%H5320><s%>
Pathrus, <S%H6625><s%> Casluh, <S%H3695><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came, <S%H3318><s%> and Caphtor. <S%H3732><s%>
And Canaan <S%H3667><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> his first-born, Heth, <S%H2845><s%>
and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%>
the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> the Arkites, <S%H6208><s%> the Sinites, <S%H5513><s%>
the Arvadites, <S%H721><s%> the Zemarites, <S%H6786><s%> and the Hamathites. <S%H2577><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%> [were] Elam, <S%H5867><s%> Asshur, <S%H804><s%> Arpachshad, <S%H775><s%> Lud, <S%H3865><s%> Aram, <S%H758><s%> Uz, <S%H5780><s%> Hul, <S%H2343><s%> Gether, <S%H1666><s%> and Meshech. <S%H4902><s%>
And Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shelah <S%H7974><s%> and Shelah <S%H7974><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eber. <S%H5677><s%>

And two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to Eber, <S%H5677><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Peleg, <S%H6389><s%> for in his days <S%H3117><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was divided, <S%H6385><s%> and his brother's name <S%H8034><s%> was Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>
And Joktan <S%H3355><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Almodad, <S%H486><s%> Sheleph, <S%H8026><s%> Hazarmaveth, <S%H2700><s%> Jerah, <S%H3392><s%>
Hadoram, <S%H1913><s%> Uzal, <S%H187><s%> Diklah, <S%H1853><s%>
Ebal, <S%H9402><s%> Abimael, <S%H39><s%> Sheba, <S%H7614><s%>
Ophir, <S%H211><s%> Havilah, <S%H2341><s%> and Jobab; <S%H3103><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joktan. <S%H3355><s%>
Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Arpachshad, <S%H775><s%> Shelah, <S%H7974><s%>
Serug, <S%H8286><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Terah, <S%H8646><s%>
Abram, <S%H87><s%> that is Abraham. <S%H85><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> [were] Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are their genealogies: <S%H8435><s%> the first-born of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> [was] Nebaioth, <S%H5032><s%> then Kedar, <S%H6938><s%> Adbeel, <S%H110><s%> Mibsam, <S%H4017><s%>
Mishma, <S%H4927><s%> Dumah, <S%H1746><s%> Massa, <S%H4854><s%> Hadad, <S%H2301><s%> Tema, <S%H8485><s%>
Jetur, <S%H3195><s%> Naphish <S%H5305><s%> and Kedemah; <S%H6929><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah, <S%H6989><s%> Abraham's concubine, <S%H6370><s%> [whom] she bore, <S%H3205><s%> [were] Zimran, <S%H2175><s%> Jokshan, <S%H3370><s%> Medan, <S%H4091><s%> Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Ishbak, <S%H3435><s%> and Shuah. <S%H7774><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jokshan <S%H3370><s%> [were] Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan. <S%H1719><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> [were] Ephah, <S%H5891><s%> Epher, <S%H6081><s%> Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> Abida, <S%H28><s%> and Eldaah. <S%H420><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah. <S%H6989><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Isaac. <S%H3327><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> [were] Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> [were] Eliphaz, <S%H464><s%> Reuel, <S%H7467><s%> Jeush, <S%H3266><s%> Jalam, <S%H3281><s%> and Korah. <S%H7141><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> [were] Teman, <S%H8487><s%> Omar, <S%H201><s%> Zephi, <S%H6825><s%> Gatam, <S%H1609><s%> Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> Timna, <S%H8555><s%> and Amalek. <S%H6002><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%> [were] Nahath, <S%H5184><s%> Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> Shammah, <S%H8048><s%> and Mizzah. <S%H4199><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%> [were] Lotan, <S%H3877><s%> Shobal, <S%H7732><s%> Zibeon, <S%H6649><s%> Anah, <S%H6034><s%> Dishon, <S%H1787><s%> Ezer, <S%H687><s%> and Dishan. <S%H1789><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lotan <S%H3877><s%> [were] Hori <S%H2752><s%> and Homam; <S%H1950><s%> and Lotan's sister <S%H269><s%> [was] Timna. <S%H8555><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal <S%H7732><s%> [were] Alian, <S%H5935><s%> Manahath, <S%H4506><s%> Ebal, <S%H5858><s%> Shephi, <S%H8195><s%> and Onam. <S%H208><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%> [were] Aiah <S%H345><s%> and Anah. <S%H6034><s%>

The son <S%H1121><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> [was] Dishon. <S%H1787><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishon <S%H1787><s%> [were] Hamran, <S%H2566><s%> Eshban, <S%H790><s%> Ithran, <S%H3506><s%> and Cheran. <S%H3763><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ezer <S%H687><s%> [were] Bilhan, <S%H1092><s%> Zaavan <S%H2190><s%> and Jaakan. <S%H3292><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishan <S%H1789><s%> [were] Uz <S%H5780><s%> and Aran. <S%H765><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> any king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> reigned. <S%H4427><s%> Bela <S%H1106><s%> [was] the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor, <S%H1160><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Dinhabah. <S%H1838><s%>

When Bela <S%H1106><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Jobab <S%H3103><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> of Bozrah <S%H1224><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>
When Jobab <S%H3103><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Husham <S%H2367><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Temanites <S%H8489><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

When Husham <S%H2367><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Hadad <S%H1908><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bedad, <S%H911><s%> who defeated <S%H5221><s%> Midian <S%H4080><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place; <S%H8478><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> [was] Avith. <S%H5762><s%>
When Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Samlah <S%H8072><s%> of Masrekah <S%H4957><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>
When Samlah <S%H8072><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Shaul <S%H7586><s%> of Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%> by the River <S%H5104><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>
When Shaul <S%H7586><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> Baal-hanan the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

When Baal-hanan died, <S%H4191><s%> Hadad <S%H1908><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place; <S%H8478><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Pai, <S%H6464><s%> and his wife's name <S%H8034><s%> was Mehetabel, <S%H4105><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Matred, <S%H4308><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Mezahab. <S%H4314><s%>

Then Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%> Now the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> were: chief <S%H441><s%> Timna, <S%H8555><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Aliah, <S%H5933><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Jetheth, <S%H3509><s%>
chief <S%H441><s%> Oholibamah, <S%H173><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Elah, <S%H425><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Pinon, <S%H6373><s%>
chief <S%H441><s%> Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Teman, <S%H8487><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Mibzar, <S%H4014><s%>
chief <S%H441><s%> Magdiel, <S%H4025><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Iram. <S%H5902><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom. <S%H9000><s%>
